endpoints.description: Returns the full state of the game, including players, events, and stats.
Returns stats and state for the local (active) player.
Returns ability information for the local player (e.g., cooldowns, levels).
Returns the summoner name of the local player.
Returns the full rune configuration for the local player.
Returns a list of in-game events (kills, towers, objectives, etc.).
Returns general game info like mode, game time, map, and terrain.
Returns the stats and details of all players in the match.
Returns the KDA, CS, and ward score for a given player.
Returns the summoner spells for a specific player.
Returns the current item list for a specific player.
Returns the keystone and rune trees for a specific player.
